caseStudies.tags: Data structures / Algorithms / Graph Algorithms / Visualization / Typescript /
caseStudies.title: Graph-Algorithms-Visualization
caseStudies.description: This is a visualization of common graph algorithms. Graph Traversal Algorithms such as breadth-first search and depth-first search and Shortest Path Algorithms such as dijkstra's and bellman ford's algorithm. In addition to this we solve a few programming problems using the graph algorithms.

caseStudies.tags: Frontend Development / Backend Development / React / Node / API / Ecommerce /
caseStudies.title: Bakery Shop
caseStudies.description: A client wanted to scale the business to reach a wider range of clientel and the e-comerce store was more than expected. Clients dont have to leave their comfort to make a booking and the baker has time to focus fully on the creative work fully.

caseStudies.title: Rest API
caseStudies.description: This is a Node API for a blog where by users can sign up and sign in and perform CRUD operations on posts in a MongoDB database.
